name: Aloe
Relationship: Complementary: Sulphur; compare: Kali-bich.; Lycop.; Allium sat.
Modalities: Worse: early morning; summer; heat; in hot
Worse: dry weather; after eating or drinking

Head: Headache alternates with lumbago, with intestinal and uterine affections
Disinclination to mental labor
Aches above forehead, with heaviness in eyes, must partially close them
Stomach: Pain in pit when making false step
After eating, flatulence, pulsation in rectum, and sexual irritation
Abdomen: Abdomen feels full, heavy, hot, bloated
Fullness in region of liver, pain under right ribs
Weak feeling, as if diarrhoea would come on
Sensation of plug between symphysis pubis and os coccyges, with urging to stool
Great accumulation of flatus, pressing downwards, causing distress in lower bowels
Rectum: Hemorrhoids protrude like grapes; very sore and tender; better cold water application
Jelly-like stools, with soreness in rectum after stool
Uncertain whether gas or stool will come
Stool passes without effort, almost unnoticed
Constipation, with heavy pressure in lower part of abdomen
Sense of insecurity in rectum, when passing flatus
Feeling of weakness and loss of power of sphincter ani
Constant bearing down in rectum; bleeding, sore, and hot; relieved by cold water
A lot of mucus, with pain in rectum after stool
Respiratory: Difficult respiration, with stitches from liver to chest
Eyes: Compelled to make small during pain in forehead
Redness of eyes with yellow vision
Ears: Sudden explosion and clashing in left ear
Tinkling as of some thin, shivered, metallic globe in head
Urine: Incontinence in aged, bearing-down sensation and enlarged prostate
Back: Lumbago alternating with headache and piles
Pain in small of back; worse moving
Female: Bearing down in rectum, worse standing and during menses
Labor-like pains in loins; extend down legs
Uterus feels heavy, cannot walk much on that account
Menses too early and too profuse
Throat: Varicose condition of veins in pharynx

details: An excellent remedy to aid in re-establishing physiological equilibrium after much dosing, where disease and drug symptoms are much mixed. There is no remedy richer in symptoms of portal congestion and none that has given better clinical results, both for the primary pathological condition and secondary phenomena. Bad effects from sedentary life or habits. Especially suitable to lymphatic and hypochondriacal patients. The rectal symptoms usually determine the choice. Adapted to weary people, the aged, and phlegmatic, old beer-drinkers. Dissatisfied and angry about himself, alternating with lumbago. Heat internally and externally. Has been used successfully in the treatment of consumption by giving the pure juice.
dosage: Sixth potency and higher. In rectal conditions, a few doses of the third, then wait.
